title: Otosico Havili
text: Otosico Havili (born 14 September 1963) is a Tongan <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201984%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Middleweight">men's middleweight</a> event at the <a href="1984%20Summer%20Olympics">1984 Summer Olympics</a>. At the 1984 Summer Olympics, he lost to <a href="Ar%C3%ADstides%20Gonz%C3%A1lez">Arístides González</a> of Puerto Rico.
